confirmMessage: We are so excited to have you as part of our special day!
declineMessage: We will miss you, but if you still want to participate virtually, we will share a link where the ceremony will be broadcasted
formErrorMessage: We couldn't find your name on the guest list, please check that you have written it correctly.
formQuestion: Although there are many details missing, we want to know if you will attend our wedding.
maybeMessage: No problem, you have time to decide. Confirm as soon as you can to be part of our day.
message: We are excited to imagine that day surrounded by those we love.
messageDate: <bold>March 21st, 2026</bold> we get married in <bold>La Paz, Bolivia</bold>
name: Name
plusOne: Will you attend with a plus one?
selectYourName: Select your name from the list
